'System.Diagnostics.Debugger.Break() ' server-side Method (VB): xPLM Generate Part Number ' ' called OnBeforeAdd and OnBeforeUpdate ' Generating a Part number based on "Defult Part" Sequence from Aras ' Dim thisType As String = Me.getAttribute("type","") Dim thisAction As String = Me.getAttribute("action","") Dim partNumber As String = Me.getProperty("item_number","") Dim classPath As String = Me.getProperty("classification","") Dim typeCode As String
Dim thisErr As Aras.IOM.Item Dim innovator As Aras.IOM.Innovator = Me.getInnovator()
If (thisAction = "add") Then ' generate new Numbers - if action is "add" If partNumber = "" Or partNumber = "Server Assigned" Or Left(partNumber,4) = "TMP-" Then ' Strip the item type component from path Dim caseStr = classPath.Replace("/" & thisType & "/", "/")
Select Case caseStr Case "/Text Position" typeCode="TXT" Case Else typeCode="" End Select
If (typeCode = "TXT") Then partNumber=innovator.getNextSequence("Part TextPos numbers") ' get new number count Else partNumber = innovator.getNextSequence("Default Part") 'partNumber = "P-" & partNumber 'partNumber = Left(partNumber, Len(partNumber) - 4) If (typeCode <>"") Then partNumber = Replace(partNumber, "P-", typeCode & "-") End If
Me.setProperty("item_number",partNumber) End If
' this is to cover the "Save As.." action and new versions of the item Else If (partNumber.IndexOf("Copy") >=0) Then typeCode="" ' preserve the old prefix type code (separator must be "-") - if not found, keep it a temp number Dim pos1 As Integer = partNumber.IndexOf("of ") partNumber = partNumber.SubString(pos1+3) pos1 = partNumber.IndexOf("-") If (pos1 >=0) Then typeCode = partNumber.SubString(0,pos1) ' generate a new number partNumber = innovator.getNextSequence("Default Part") 'partNumber = "P-" & partNumber 'partNumber = Left(partNumber, Len(partNumber) - 4) If (typeCode <>"") Then partNumber = Replace(partNumber, "P-", typeCode & "-") Me.setProperty("item_number",partNumber) Return Me End If End If
Return Me
